summary: This simple and lightweight mod adds Bootleg Items based in some unique items of Skyrim, their description comes with little propaganda.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Well, this mod don't add too much, it's just a test mod, ENTIRELY made with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859]TES5EDIT[/url], nothing more, nothing less, The name is itself explanatory, a mod that adds bootleg stuff in the game, some mods adds craftable unique items with no enchantment, mostly same damages or even same prices of original ones, but THIS mod adds joke named items like uniques, and some of these you can buy for your children (they will like, i assure you), but they are mostly useless for combat, don't expect much.

My english is very poor and i used this disvantage for make this mod a bit more funny.

I will not spoil here, see this mod for yourselves.

The goods can be found in general goods vendors of Skyrim (belethor, lucan valerius...)
[/size]
author: Ktreus
